cause.description:
the drumset in our band room is old and really worn out the only thing that is making the proper noise is the bass drum and one of cymbal. so we really dont have much
1. brand new everything
2. awsome-ness sexy-ness
3. sounds better more equipment
4. even comes with an free double bass pedal
cause.mission: Save Enough Funds and Money To Buy A New DrumSet
cause.name: Help Nikhil To Buy A New DrumSet
